DOC.detailed_description: This project conduct prospective before-and-after study four major trauma centre India , intervention occur pre- post-intervention phase . Included study patient present four trauma hospital potentially life-threatening limb-threatening injury . The intervention introduction structure Trauma Quality Improvement Meeting ( TQIM ) , use checklist training program . The primary outcome compliance TQIM checklist , measure proportion discuss case ( trauma death ) problem care , preventability corrective action discuss / agree . The secondary outcome include in-hospital risk-adjusted mortality , hospital length stay time emergency surgery . Data collection occur meeting four trauma hospital trauma death discuss . Data also collect dedicated trauma registry .
DOC.criteria: All patient present four study site potentially lifethreatening limbthreatening injury . Specifically , present injured patient triaged `` Red '' `` Yellow '' accord AustraliaIndia Trauma Systems Collaboration ( AITSC ) Trauma Triage Protocol , meet screen criterion data collection . Retrospective inclusion registry continue screened patient present included hospital injury ( include neardrowning ) primary diagnosis least one follow criterion : Admission hospital Death triage admission The exclusion criterion AITSC Trauma Registry : Death scene Alive triage admit hospital Isolated poison Isolated burn Single digit finger toe amputation
